validationsFieldLengthMoreThan6: length must be more than 6 characters
validationsNumbersMustEqual16Digit: field must contain more than 16 digits
validationsNumbersMustEqual14Digit: field must contain more than 14 digits
validationsNumbersMustEqual11Digit: field must contain more than 11 digits
validationsNumbersMustEqual4Digit: field must contain more than 4 digits
validationsPasswordSpecifications:
- must be more than or equal to 8 characters
- must contain letters and numbers
